text:
John Malcolm Patterson (born September 27, 1921) is a retired American politician. He was the 44th Governor of the U.S. state of Alabama. He served as governor from 1959 to 1963. Patterson was a member of the Democratic Party.
Patterson ran with the support of the Ku Klux Klan when he won the Governorship of Alabama in 1958.
Patterson was born in Goldville, Alabama.
